2007 NBA Playoffs Summary

2006 Playoffs Summary 2008 Playoffs Summary

League Champion: San Antonio Spurs

Finals MVP: Tony Parker (24.5 / 5.0 / 3.3)


2007 Playoff Leaders:

PTS: LeBron James (501)

TRB: Tim Duncan (229)

AST: LeBron James (159)

WS: LeBron James (3.7)
